Overview   Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.versant.util.backup

Interface Summary
BackupListener To signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions while backing up the database.
RestoreListener To signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions and warnings while restoring database.
StartRollforwardListener To signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions and warnings while rollforward archiving of database.
 

Class Summary
BackupInformation Stores the information of the backups taken on the databases.
BackupVisitor Used by the backup listener for assigning the respective parameters of backup device like name, capacity, blocking factor and the position on the device.
DeviceInformation Stores the information of the device on which backup has been taken.
Options Contains the options information for backing up database/s, restoring, logging of database.
RestoreVisitor Used by the Restore listener for assigning the respective parameters of backup device like name, capacity, blocking factor, the position on the device and to specify the full path of the logical.log file or to specify the full path where a copy of the logical.log file should be created.
RollforwardVisitor Used by the rollforward listener for assigning the respective parameters of backup device like name, capacity, blocking factor and the position on the device.
VBackupManager The Entry class for the user to use the vbackup utility through JVI.
VBackupProgressStatus Stores the information about the status of backup /restore
